findings.details: Headline and supporting tagline can be balanced and constrained for better mobile readability.
Reviewed templates and recent posts via grep; no placeholder or http:// links found. External link availability not verified without network checks.
Core meta tags and structured data present in layouts; share page uses SEO tag and sitemap/RSS links.
Homepage and share page copy is clear; minor tuning needed for headline wrapping on smaller screens.

recommendations: Balance share page headline and constrain tagline width for improved mobile scanning
